entry.title: WIND WARNING , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 12:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: WSW 38 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast overnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
